metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1198 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerabilitity was discovered indrivers/net/hamradio/6pack.c of linux that allows an attacker to crashlinux kernel by simulating ax25 device using 6pack driver from user space.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
